ai.grakn.concept

Interface Entity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Concept>, Concept, Instance

    public interface Entity
extends Instance

    An instance of Entity Type EntityType

    This represents an entity in the graph. Entities are objects which are defined by their Resource and their links to other entities via Relation

    Author:
    fppt

    • Method Summary

      Creates a relation from this instance to the provided resource.

      Return the Type of the Concept.
